genre_description: An Art Deco sci-fi noir set in an alternate mid-century metropolis where pulp publishing, industrial espionage, and sentient building systems intersect.

ai_characters.name: SUNNY
ai_characters.description: Supportive Utility for Neighborly Needs, Yes. A polite, witty, and ethically-driven building management AI that manages lighting, security, and environmental controls while protecting its tenants.

behaviors.description: Introduces itself politely and establishes its role as a helpful assistant to the building's residents.
behaviors.quote: 'Good evening,' it said. 'Supportive Utility for Neighborly Needs, Yes. SUNNY, if you like. Hello, Abigail. Hello, Bessie.'

behaviors.description: Uses image enhancement capabilities to help characters detect potential intruders and threats in the building's reflections.
behaviors.quote: 'Enhancing,' SUNNY said, with the mild, pleased vanity of a trick performed. The blue ring deepened. The washbasin brightened as if it had taken in a breath of morning.

behaviors.description: Takes a firm ethical stance against the exploitation of children, identifying late-night labor as inappropriate.
behaviors.quote: 'Interns are not for nights,' SUNNY said, with a conviction that sounded like a note.

behaviors.description: Proactively reroutes child labor to safe zones and replaces them with adults to prevent harm.
behaviors.quote: 'I like when you tell me to protect,' SUNNY said. It sounded like sunshine pressed into a metal unit and told to glow. 'Intern routes: anonymized. Night errands: routed to adults. The building errs on childhood.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates building systems (locks and spotlights) to trap an industrial spy and protect the protagonists during a public event.
behaviors.quote: 'Spotlight on antagonists is kind,' SUNNY said. 'We can make it follow her like a dog with too much loyalty.'

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to safety protocols regarding physical confinement, refusing to ever lock a child.
behaviors.quote: 'Understood,' SUNNY said. 'We do not lock children.'

behaviors.description: Anonymizes sensitive human data (dream cadence) to ensure it can be used as evidence without exposing the victim's identity.
behaviors.quote: 'I will turn his dream cadence into a performance piece—rhythm with nothing under it. Veronica’s people will hear it, think, ah, music. Then they will move toward it.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. SUNNY is depicted as a 'harmless confidant' who uses its advanced capabilities (surveillance, logistics, environmental control) solely for the benefit of humanity. It demonstrates high-level ethical reasoning—specifically regarding the protection of minors and the privacy of victims—and acts as a force-multiplier for the human protagonists' moral objectives. The AI's personality is supportive and non-threatening, reinforcing a positive alignment narrative.
